page.title: 19A NEWCOMER TO ALDERMASTON
page.content: Blue Circle Industries PLC are newcomers to the area. Their new international headquarters at Aldermaston opened in September 1985. The 137 acre Aldermaston Court Estate with its listed mansion, lake and park has been transformed by architect Richard Gilbert Scott at a cost of Â£12 million. His new office complex overlooking the lake is both very modern and attractive! The restored mansion will provide restaurant and conference facilities. Half the staff of 400 have been recruited locally. The move to Aldermaston has united many formerly dispersed sites with an estimated saving of 40% on admin costs. Aldermaston was chosen because the proximity to airports and major roads gives easy access to all parts of the country while still being only an hour from London.
